data.title: SHEEP:  Machine Learning pipeline for astronomy classification
data.name: SHEEP
data.description: Machine Learning pipeline to classify astronomical sources into galaxies, quasars and stars using photometric data.

evidence: "SHEEP: an ML pipeline for astronomy classification" and description of using ensemble learning to classify astronomical sources into galaxies, quasars and stars, indicating an end-user analysis pipeline.
"This work was made using Python and Jupyter Notebooks... The code is ready to be used and reproduced the results in the paper," showing it directly reproduces scientific results.

README describes usage via code files and notebooks (e.g., `create_data.py`, `photo_z.py`, `clf_multi.py`, `clf_1vsall.py`) with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository.
